Not a good "southern" novel in my opinion, and a difficult, not really enjoyable read.

title: Not 4 gauge! More like 8 gauge with thick insulation!
content: The cable included in this kit appears to be 8ga with thick insulation to make it look like 4ga. I compared it to a real 4ga and a 9ga cable I had lying around and the wire is only slightly thicker than the 9ga and nowhere near the thickness of the 4ga. If you buy this, you'll note that there are no markings on the cable giving the specs. Also, a 60Amp fuse will give you ~800 Watts max at the amplifier (60 amps x 13.5 volts = 810 Watts).

title: Be sure to get a FULL frequency transmitter like this one
